trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Enfield
There were no other sightings in Enfield on or around October 10th 2010
Summary: It was very dramatic. A bunch of shapes in the sky were fluttering around in the sky. They were all different and unique.
divs: Sighting DetailsAt The end of the event something of another appeared that was unknown to me, but I could feel the presence of Shinigami, a god like being striking the Earth and creating a rift. And at the tenth second of the last minute a huge explosion, tearing the sky apart. The explosion knocked me back unconscious. When I awoke,everything was back to normal.
Object Shape: Blimp, Boomerang, Bullet, Missile, Cigar, Cone, Chevron, Circle, Cross, Cylinder, Diamond, Disc, Egg, Fireball, Flash, Oval, Saturn-like, Sphere, Square, Rectagular, Star-like, Teardrop, Triangle, Other, Unknown
